about_the_game:
Trenches of War is a fast-paced World War I-inspired strategy game. Battle through the Alps by spawning units and capturing trenches, barracks, and factories. Cross rivers that rise when it rains. Use or destroy bridges and cornfields that may aid or deter your maneuvers.

  • Strategically spawn 9 units including infantry, snipers, tanks, artillery, planes, and engineers
  • Conquer 125 hand-crafted battlefields
  • Capture buildings and powerful weapons
  • Build bridges, trenches, and structures with the engineer
  • Face off against a variety of AI personalities

Trenches of War is a fast-paced World War I-inspired strategy game. Battle through the Alps by spawning units and capturing trenches, barracks, and factories. Cross rivers that rise when it rains. Use or destroy bridges and cornfields that may aid or deter your maneuvers.

  • Strategically spawn 9 units including infantry, snipers, tanks, artillery, planes, and engineers
  • Conquer 125 hand-crafted battlefields
  • Capture buildings and powerful weapons
  • Build bridges, trenches, and structures with the engineer
  • Face off against a variety of AI personalities

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.0 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compliant video card with at least 512Mb
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compliant video card with at least 512Mb
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Trenches of War

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 9.0c compliant video card with at least 512Mb
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
